titles.title: Air Travel Ticketing Transparency and Protection Act
A bill to require large ticket agents to adopt minimum customer service standards for the purchase of air fares and related passenger air transportation services.
Air Travel Ticketing Transparency and Protection Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Air Travel Ticketing Transparency and Protection Act
This bill requires the Department of Transportation to issue a final rule to enable and require large ticket agents to adopt minimum customer service standards.
